aboutMe.title: About TangMo
aboutMe.para: Hewwo! It’s TangMo fwom Thaiwand, wiving faw fwom home. Da name witewawwy twanswates to “watewmewon”. I’d be happy to chat about stuff fwom tech, photogwaphy, to daiwy dose of fuwwy memes. I spend a wot of time on VWChat, usuawwy as da defauwt “Anemo” avataw (pictuwed). Hope to see uu awound!

aboutChara.title: About da chawactew
aboutChara.imageAlt: Bust shot painting of TangMo’s chawactew
aboutChara.para: Bwue wowf numbew 23,547, wepowting fow duty! I just finished putting cowows on a tempwate wefewence sheet; hazn’t made a pwopew one.

booking.title: Book My Body!
booking.intro: Want to pway with me? Pewhaps in pwivate? Wequest booking hewe!
booking.form_info: What do uu want to do to me uwu?
booking.form_notice: Once uu submit da fowm, I wiww weview da wequest and send uu quotation on Tewegwam.

result.title: Eww…
result.content: You might haz taken da joke too sewiouswy. But if uu awe weawwy bowed, uu feew fwee to come {link}.
